channel.title: Need help with max combat level!
channel.description: How do i change the max combat level? Please help!

item.title: Need help with max combat level!
item.dc:creator: @Macko11 Macko11
item.description:
@Macko11 wrote:

Search for public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { in client.java and you should see

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if (output >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }
    return 99;
} [/code]

change the 99’s to the stat level you want and it will change ur cb lvl like 135 is cb 172 … hope it hlped.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with max combat level!
